data.title: The Tavern Grill Restaurant + Bar
data.meta_description: View our scratch made menu items featuring house made sauces, chef built creations, and jaw dropping desserts. There is something for everyone at The Tavern Grill.
data.meta_site_name: Tavern Grill Restaurants | Home of the Build Your Own
